This world is created by Stigmata, but has its own rules.

Bronya, Seele, and Himeko who live here, all have complete consciousness. At first I thought they are just the information created by Stigmata, but the more I get along with them, I can better understand their meaning.
在这个世界中生存的布洛妮娅，希儿，还有姬子她们，都有着完整意识的形态。原本我也以为她们是由圣痕创造出来的情报而已，但越是与她们相处，就越能明白她们的意义。
この世界のブローニャ、ゼーレ、それから姫子たちは、独立した意識を持っている。私も最初、聖痕によって作られた情報体だと思ってたけど、彼女たちと接触すればするほど、その存在を理解していったわ。
이 세계의 브로냐、제레、그리고 히메코들은、독립된 의식을 가지고 있다. 나도 처음에는 성흔에 의해 만들어진 정보체라고 생각했지만、그녀들과 접촉하면 할수록、그 존재를 이해하게 되었어.

The Bronya, Seele, and Himeko of this world all have independent consciousness. At first I thought they were just information created by Stigmata, but the more I spent time with them, the more I understood their existence.

The Bronya, Hier, and Himeko girls who survive in this world all have the form of full consciousness. Originally, I also thought they were just information created by the stigmata, but the more I spent time with them, the more I understood their significance.

The Bronya, Seele, and Himeko of this world have independent consciousnesses. At first I too thought they were information bodies created by the Stigmata, but the more I came into contact with them, the more I understood their existence.
msg
Five years after the big Honkai, the hardness and sadness they've been through, is true and real memory, so……they are like us, are the unique existence in the world.
在大崩坏后五年的时间中，她们所经受过的种种挫折与磨难，都是真切完备毫无虚假的记忆，因此…她们和我们一样，在这个世界中都是无可取代的存在。
大崩壊が発生した後の5年間、彼女たちが経験した様々な試練、それは嘘のない、ちゃんとした記憶なのよ……だから、彼女たちは私たちと同じ、この世界ではかけがえのない存在なの。
대붕괴가 발생한 후의 5년간, 그녀들이 경험한 다양한 시련, 그것은 거짓 없는, 제대로 된 기억이야…… 그러니까, 그녀들은 우리와 마찬가지로, 이 세계에서는 대체할 수 없는 존재인 거야.
In the five years after the Great Crash, the frustrations and tribulations they have endured are true and complete memories, so...they are as irreplaceable as we are in this world.
The various ordeals they went through in the five years after the Great Collapse occurred, they are proper memories that don't lie ......, so they are irreplaceable in this world, just like us.

It's easy…There're a Bronya and a Seele existing here, we can't let our Bronya and Seele come here, otherwise will lead to conflicts, that make the world more chaotic.

つまり、この世界にはすでにブローニャとゼーレが存在しているから、私たちの世界のブローニャとゼーレはここに連れてはこれない。そうでないと取り返しのつかない衝突が起こって、この世界がますます不安定になってしまうのよ。
